name: Rene
body:
# René
René is a graph renderer driven by APL, a language of greater uniformity and extensibility than traditional Mathematics notation.

![Curve](http://f.cl.ly/items/2j0Z3l251R0b282L2R2W/curve.png)

## Usage

Functions are to be provided in a slightly modified form of APL expressions. Often 
these expressions are indistinguishable from traditional arithmetic notation, but at 
other times they may look strikingly different.

```javascript
// f(x) = (x^3)/2 + 5
ƒ("(x^3)/2+5").graph(document.getElementById('cvs'))
```

```javascript
// f(x) = 2cos(x)
ƒ("2*1•x").graph(document.getElementById('cvs'))
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
